law.catch_line: Permit not relieving person from complying with provisions of KRS 367.4905 to 367.4917.
law.text: A permit issued pursuant to law authorizing excavation or demolition work shall not relieve a person from the responsibility for complying with KRS 367.4905 to 367.4917.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 425, sec. 3, effective January 1, 1995.
